name: yhangry
headline: Marketplace for private chefs
description:
Yhangry is a private chef marketplace, where you can book a chef whenever you want to socialize at home.

For $40pp, you can book a 3-course feast in just a few clicks. On the supply side, we help chefs earn 3 times as much as working in a restaurant.

founders.name: Heinin Zhang, Founder
founders.description: I'm the Co-founder and Co-CEO of yhangry. I grew up in Germany and China and I studied Philosophy and Economics at the London School of Economics, before starting my career on the trading floor at Goldman Sachs. I'm a big foodie and wine-lover but always too busy to cook for my friends, hence yhangry to the rescue. In my free time, I compete my horse in eventing.

founders.name: Siddhi Mittal, Founder
founders.description: I'm the Co-Founder and Co CEO of yhangry. I grew up in India, studied Computer Science (Artificial Intelligence) @ Columbia University in New York, and love to solve real-life problems using technology. Before yhangry, I was a credit trader for over six years, running over $700m of credit risk (across mortgages and financial credit). I'm also a (competitive) Bollywood dancer and a major coffee addict that brews her own barista coffee.

generated_description:
**Yhangry: A New Way to Dine at Home**

Founded in 2020 and rocking the Y Combinator Batch W22, Yhangry is based in London, UK. It’s not just another food delivery service; it’s a private chef marketplace that has made it effortless to book a talented chef right to your home for various occasions.

**The Concept**: Yhangry offers a seamless solution to anyone wanting to socialise over a home-cooked meal. For approximately $40 per person, patrons can secure a three-course feast—with minimal clicks. Think of it as taking the restaurant experience up a notch: instead of navigating crowded spaces, you get fine dining in the comfort of your own home. 

On the flip side, it’s a lucrative path for chefs. Yhangry helps culinary professionals earn up to three times more than typical restaurant roles, creating a win-win scenario.

**How it Works**:
1. **Personalised Experience**: Users specify their preferences, vibe, and budget. 
2. **Curated Quotes**: Within about 20 minutes, clients receive tailored menus and quotes from various chefs.
3. **Customisation**: After booking, customers can still tweak their menus through direct chats with their chef.

**Diverse Offerings**: The platform is a treasure trove for food lovers. Whether you're hosting a birthday party, wedding, or a casual get-together, the chefs create bespoke menus tailored to individual tastes. The options range from vegan meals, international cuisines, fine dining experiences, to kid-friendly menus—there’s something for every palate.

**Why Choose Yhangry?**
- **Vetted and Rated Chefs**: Each chef comes with a transparent rating and review system, ensuring quality.
- **Secure Payment**: All payments are safely held until the event, minimising risk.
- **Insurance**: Public liability insurance covers any mishaps during the chef’s service.
- **Flexible Policies**: Yhangry offers easy cancellation procedures and a dedicated support team.

With a team of 12, under the guidance of Group Partner Michael Seibel, and a growing clientele of over 40,000 customers, Yhangry is on a mission to redefine dining experiences—one event at a time.

If you’re looking to explore this marketplace or need a private chef for your next gathering, head over to [Yhangry’s Website](http://www.yhangry.com). This isn’t just about food; it’s about making memories—including the culinary ones—accessible and delightful.
